starter:
Hello $(recipient-name1) and $(recipient-name2)!

We're happy to have you on board for the VISUM Running Dinner on October 10!
We wish you an exciting and multicultural (and multiculinary ;) ) evening!

You are going to cook the starter.

Here is all the information you need:


Starter
----------------------

When? 19:00h
Where? Your Place ($(starter-cook-address))
Who? Your guests are:
- $(starter-guest1-name1) (phone: $(starter-guest1-phone1)) and $(starter-guest1-name2), (phone: $(starter-guest1-phone2))
- $(starter-guest2-name1) (phone: $(starter-guest2-phone1)) and $(starter-guest2-name2), (phone: $(starter-guest2-phone2))

Comments from $(starter-guest1-name1) and $(starter-guest1-name2):
$(starter-guest1-comments)

Comments from $(starter-guest2-name1) and $(starter-guest2-name2):
$(starter-guest2-comments)

It would be great if you could help your guests find their way to your place by decorating the place a little bit with balloons and signs :)


Main dish
----------------------

When? 20:30h
Where? $(main-cook-address)
Who? Your cooks are going to be $(main-cook-name1) (phone: $(main-cook-phone1)) and $(main-cook-name2), (phone: $(main-cook-phone2))

Comments from $(main-cook-name1) and $(main-cook-name2):
$(main-cook-comments)


Dessert
----------------------

When? 22:00h
Where? $(dessert-cook-address)
Who? Your cooks are going to be $(dessert-cook-name1) (phone: $(dessert-cook-phone1)) and $(dessert-cook-name2), (phone: $(dessert-cook-phone2))

Comments from $(dessert-cook-name1) and $(dessert-cook-name2):
$(dessert-cook-comments)


After the dessert the event officially ends but usually the hosts of the dessert and their guests spend some time easing into the night :)

If you have any food allergies or other dietary restrictions, please be kind and inform your hosts so they can prepare accordingly.

If you have any questions, feel free to send us an email to info@visum-mannheim.de


Cheers,
Your VISUM Team

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Hallo $(recipient-name1) und $(recipient-name2)!

Wir freuen uns, dass ihr beim VISUM Running Dinner am 10. Oktober dabei seid.
Wir wünschen euch viel Spaß und einen multikulturellen - multikulinarischen Abend!

Ihr kocht bei euch die Vorspeise.

Hier folgen nun eure benötigten Daten:


Vorspeise
----------------------

Wann? 19:00h
Wo? bei euch ($(starter-cook-address))
Wer? Eure Gäste sind
- $(starter-guest1-name1) (phone: $(starter-guest1-phone1)) and $(starter-guest1-name2), (phone: $(starter-guest1-phone2))
- $(starter-guest2-name1) (phone: $(starter-guest2-phone1)) and $(starter-guest2-name2), (phone: $(starter-guest2-phone2))

Infos von $(starter-guest1-name1) und $(starter-guest1-name2):
$(starter-guest1-comments)

Infos von $(starter-guest2-name1) und $(starter-guest2-name2):
$(starter-guest2-comments)

Es wäre schön, wenn ihr euren Gästen den Weg zu euch etwas erleichtert und nach Möglichkeit z.B. Luftballons oder ein paar  Wegweiser in der Nähe  der Wohnung aufhängt, damit der Weg schnell gefunden werden kann.


Hauptgang
----------------------

Wann? Beginn 20:30h
Wo? $(main-cook-address)
Wer? Euro Köche sind: $(main-cook-name1) (Tel.: $(main-cook-phone1)) und $(main-cook-name2), (Tel.: $(main-cook-phone2))

Infos von $(main-cook-name1) und $(main-cook-name2):
$(main-cook-comments)


Nachtisch
----------------------

Wann? 22:00h
Wo? $(dessert-cook-address)
Wer? Eure Köche sind: $(dessert-cook-name1) (Tel.: $(dessert-cook-phone1)) und $(dessert-cook-name2), (Tel.: $(dessert-cook-phone2))

Infos von $(dessert-cook-name1) und $(dessert-cook-name2):
$(dessert-cook-comments)


Nach dem Essen könnt ihr den Abend zusammen beim eurer letzten Station ausklingen lassen :)

Falls ihr Vegetarier seid, meldet euch bitte selbstständig bei euren Köchen, damit diese sich darauf einstellen können!

Falls irgendwelche Probleme auftreten sollten, könnt ihr uns eine Email schreiben an info@visum-mannheim.de


Euer VISUM Team
